name: test_success_new_user_registration
description:
Verify that a new user can register successfully and
        is redirected to the Garage page with a success alert.

steps.name: Open page: "https://guest:welcome2qauto@qauto2.forstudy.space/"
Click Sign in button in the header
Click on "('xpath', "//button[@class='btn btn-outline-white header_signin']")"
Click Registration button in "Log in" modal window
Click on "('xpath', "//button[@class='btn btn-link' and text()='Registration']")"
Fill in Registration form valid creds
Fill in "Name" field by "Test" in "Registration" modal window
Fill in field "('css selector', '#signupName')" by text: "Test"
Find element: "('css selector', '#signupName')"
Fill in "Last_name" field by "User" in "Registration" modal window
Fill in field "('css selector', '#signupLastName')" by text: "User"
Find element: "('css selector', '#signupLastName')"
Fill in "Email" field by "testuser_ab17b4@mail.com" in "Registration" modal window
Fill in field "('css selector', '#signupEmail')" by text: "testuser_ab17b4@mail.com"
Find element: "('css selector', '#signupEmail')"
Fill in "Password" field by "Test12345678" in "Registration" modal window
Fill in field "('css selector', '#signupPassword')" by text: "Test12345678"
Find element: "('css selector', '#signupPassword')"
Fill in "Password" field by "Test12345678" in "Registration" modal window
Fill in field "('css selector', '#signupRepeatPassword')" by text: "Test12345678"
Find element: "('css selector', '#signupRepeatPassword')"
Click on "Registration" button
Click on "('xpath', "//div/button[@class='btn btn-primary' and text()='Register']")"
Check that user located on Garage page
Find element: "('xpath', '//div/app-garage/div/div[1]/h1')"
Verify that success registration alert is displayed
Find element: "('xpath', "//div[@class='alert alert-success']/p[text()='Registration complete']")"
